item.title: [DB] Redis Transaction
item.description: Unlike RDBMS, Redis doesnâ€™t have a traditional transaction mechanism. It primarily operates as a single-threaded cache, but transactions can still be made atomic using TX pipelines or Lua scripts. This post focuses on comparing the pros and cons of Lua scripts vs. TX pipelines.
